name: Flowboard
tagline: Visual project management for growing teams
description: Flowboard combines kanban boards, timelines, and team chat in one clean interface. Built for startups who want clarity without complexity, it replaces five disconnected tools with a single workspace. Teams at seed-stage through Series B use Flowboard to ship faster and stay aligned.

name: AI Writer Pro
tagline: Generate copy, blogs, and ad scripts with AI in seconds
description: AI Writer Pro uses GPT-4 to help content teams produce on-brand copy 10x faster. It comes with 80+ templates for landing pages, emails, social posts, and long-form articles. The built-in brand voice editor ensures every output sounds like your company.

name: Nocodr
tagline: Build full-stack web apps without writing a single line of code
description: Nocodr is the most powerful no-code platform for founders and product managers. Drag-and-drop components, built-in database, auth, and one-click deployment make it possible to launch a production-ready app in a weekend. Over 12,000 apps have been shipped on Nocodr.

name: DataPulse
tagline: Real-time analytics dashboard designed for SaaS businesses
description: DataPulse turns scattered metrics into a single source of truth. Connect Stripe, Mixpanel, and 40+ data sources in minutes and watch MRR, churn, and activation rates update in real time. Ideal for growth teams who live in dashboards.

name: CRMflow
tagline: Lightweight CRM purpose-built for startups and freelancers
description: CRMflow cuts through enterprise CRM bloat and gives small teams only what they need: a clean pipeline, email sequences, and contact tracking. Set up in under five minutes with a Notion-like interface that your whole team will actually use.

name: Zapwire
tagline: Connect 500+ apps and automate your entire business workflow
description: Zapwire is the automation layer your startup needs to eliminate repetitive work. Build multi-step workflows between your CRM, marketing tools, databases, and communication apps without code. The visual editor makes debugging automations fast and collaborative.

name: Launchbase
tagline: The #1 directory to discover, submit, and launch your startup
description: Launchbase is where 50,000+ founders discover new startups every month. Submit your product to reach early adopters, get community feedback, and be featured in a weekly newsletter sent to 80,000 subscribers. More than a directory — it's a launchpad.

name: PitchDeck AI
tagline: Create stunning investor pitch decks in under 10 minutes
description: PitchDeck AI analyzes your one-liner and business model to generate a professionally designed 12-slide pitch deck. It knows what investors expect at each funding stage and fills in the narrative, charts, and design automatically. Export to PDF or present live in the browser.

name: Buildify
tagline: Marketplace for vetted MVP builders — ship your idea in weeks
description: Buildify connects non-technical founders with hand-vetted development partners who specialise in MVPs. Browse by tech stack, timeline, and budget. All builds come with a 30-day post-launch support guarantee and over 400 MVPs have shipped on the platform.

name: FundFlow
tagline: Find the right investors for your stage, sector, and geography
description: FundFlow is an intelligent investor discovery platform with a database of 18,000+ VCs, angels, and family offices. Smart filters match your stage, check size, and vertical. Track outreach, manage relationships, and get warm intro paths through your network.

name: InvestMatch
tagline: Get matched with angel investors in 48 hours
description: InvestMatch uses a compatibility algorithm to pair your startup with angels who have invested in similar companies. Fill out a short profile, and within 48 hours you will have three curated introductions waiting in your inbox. No cold outreach, no guesswork.

name: SeedRound
tagline: Pre-seed and seed-stage funding toolkit for first-time founders
description: SeedRound bundles every resource a first-time founder needs when raising their first check: SAFE templates, cap table calculator, investor CRM, and a video course on closing your first round. Trusted by 3,000+ founders who have collectively raised over $200M.

name: PixelLab Studio
tagline: Award-winning UI/UX design studio for ambitious startups
description: PixelLab Studio is a boutique design studio that has helped 200+ startups craft their product identity from zero to Series A. The team specialises in mobile-first design systems, brand strategy, and conversion-focused landing pages. Average turnaround: 3 weeks.

name: BuildAgency
tagline: Full-stack development from design to deployment
description: BuildAgency delivers end-to-end web and mobile development for startups that need to move fast without compromising quality. The team of 15 engineers covers React, React Native, Node, and cloud infrastructure. Fixed-price sprints start at $8,000.

name: ContentForge
tagline: Content strategy and creation for fast-growing tech companies
description: ContentForge is a content studio that helps B2B SaaS companies own their niche through long-form articles, case studies, and product-led content. Their SEO-first approach has helped clients grow organic traffic by 300% in 12 months.

name: DevVault
tagline: 500+ free boilerplates, templates, and starter kits for developers
description: DevVault is the ultimate developer resource library with production-ready starters for Next.js, React Native, Express, FastAPI, and more. Every template is maintained, documented, and vetted by the community. Save weeks on project setup and focus on what matters: your product.

name: StartupOS
tagline: The complete operating system for running your startup
description: StartupOS is a curated collection of frameworks, playbooks, and templates built from the learnings of 500+ successful startups. Covers every stage from ideation to Series B: hiring plans, OKR systems, board decks, customer discovery scripts, and go-to-market playbooks.

name: RemoteStack
tagline: The best remote engineering jobs from top-tier startups
description: RemoteStack curates remote-first tech jobs from verified startups and scaleups. No agencies, no grey listings — every role is posted directly by the hiring team. Job seekers get AI-powered resume scoring and weekly personalised email digests.

name: TechHire
tagline: Hire senior engineers for your startup in 14 days or less
description: TechHire talent network of 4,000+ pre-vetted engineers is available on demand. Every candidate passes a 6-hour technical assessment before joining. Typical time-to-hire is 11 days. If you do not hire in 21 days, you pay nothing.

name: FounderHub
tagline: Private network for 15,000+ startup founders to connect and grow
description: FounderHub is an invite-only community where startup founders share real insights, get feedback on big decisions, and support each other through the hardest parts of building. Weekly live AMAs with successful founders, a deal-sharing channel, and co-founder matching.

name: GrowthCircle
tagline: Weekly growth experiments shared by 10k+ startup marketers
description: GrowthCircle is a community-driven newsletter and knowledge base where marketers share their exact growth playbooks. Every week members vote on the best experiment, which gets turned into a deep-dive breakdown. 10,000 subscribers, 98% open rate.

name: CloudScale
tagline: Managed cloud infrastructure and DevOps for early-stage startups
description: CloudScale handles the entire infrastructure layer so your engineering team can focus on the product. Managed Kubernetes, CI/CD pipelines, observability stack, and 24/7 on-call support. Startup pricing starts at $500/month with guaranteed 99.99% uptime SLA.
